text: Madhabpur Lake (Bengali:মাধবপুর হ্রদ) is a lake in Kamalganj Upazila, Moulvibazar District, of the Sylhet Division in Bangladesh. It is a natural lake inside the Madhabpur tea estate, and is considered as such of being the "National Lake of Bangladesh" respectively. == Fauna == It is home to the Great white-bellied heron, the only confirmed site in Bangladesh. Category:National symbols of Bangladesh Category:Sylhet Division
title: Madhabpur Lake
